title: Management of Mass Casualties, Part X: Management of Psychological Casualties

sources.title: Management Of Mass Casualties (1958)
sources.description: TF 8-2712 // PART X: Management of Psychological Casualties, this film by the Department of Defense discusses the nature and management of psychological casualties following a nuclear attack.

metadata.Plot: In this nuclear age, there is the real threat that military personnel will be attacked with a nuclear bomb. This film is only one in a series by the United States Army on how to manage mass casualties from a nuclear attack, this o...
